passages.text: See Appendix A- 1 for analyst certification, important disclosures and the status of non- US analysts.
Any authors named on this report are research analysts unless otherwise indicated.

We have developed a framework to identify the main short- and longer- term FX themes. There are five potential FX themes, including: commodities, oil, carry trades, equities and the dollar. A predominant theme would be identified if the underlying FX shows: 1) a consistency in returns in accordance with the identified theme; 2) there is consistency of currency performance with the benchmark. In cases when multiple themes are identified as probable, we rank the themes based on the risk- adjusted returns of the corresponding currency basket.
FX ThemeDollarThemesSignalCommoditiesUnclearOilUnclearCarryUnclearEquityProbable (2)DollarProbable (1)

With respect to Fixed Income Research: Recommendations fall into two categories: tactical, which typically last up to three months; or strategic, which typically last from 6- 12 months. However, trade recommendations may be reviewed at any time as circumstances change. 'Stop loss' levels for trades are also provided; which, if hit, closes the trade recommendation automatically. Prices and yields shown in recommendations are taken at the time of submission for publication and are based on either indicative Bloomberg, LSEG or Nomura prices and yields at that time. The prices and yields shown are not necessarily those at which the trade recommendation can be implemented.
